title: Inflation may be losing steam … here and there
itunes:title: Inflation may be losing steam … here and there
itunes:author: Marketplace / Kai Ryssdal
description: Think of inflation as a runner. In parts of the economy, that runner is slowing — still going forward, just not as fast. Today, we’ll unpack which sectors are leading the race and which are faltering. Plus, how the Fed is tackling that persistent inflation, what a Kroger-Albertsons merger means for your grocery bill and how China’s economy is doing on the eve of its 20th Communist congress.
